original_title: Tree collapses killing pre-grade student, injuring three others
original_body_lines: Gampola, Feb 05 (Daily Mirror) - A five-year-old student was killed and three other students were injured when a tree collapsed on them at an international school in Gampola.
Police said one student who was in a critical condition has been admitted to the General Hospital, Kandy.
They said a tree collapsed while some 30 students of the nursery section, were playing beneath.
